name: Scroll Any Input
description: GD Mod that enables smooth and customizable scrolling using the mouse wheel on numeric input fields.

scroll-speed.name: Scroll Speed
scroll-speed.description: Adjusts the speed of scrolling when using the mouse wheel over an input field.

scroll-reverse.name: Reverse Scroll Direction
scroll-reverse.description: Inverts the direction of scrolling when using the mouse wheel over an input field.

scroll-boundaries.name: Scroll Boundaries
scroll-boundaries.description: Specifies whether scrolling should stop at the boundaries of the input field.

scroll-step-size.name: Scroll Step Size
scroll-step-size.description: Specifies the step size of scrolling.
